mapper.select: SELECT match_id AS matchId, champion_id AS championId, kills, deaths, assists, win FROM match_detail WHERE summoner_id = #{summonerId} ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT (COUNT(*) * 100.0) / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM match_detail WHERE summonerId = #{summonerId}) AS winRate FROM match_detail WHERE summonerId = #{summonerId} AND result = 'Win'
